amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the use of funds to eliminate or restrict programs aimed at reforestation of urban areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A061) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.
